      • authenticate

        String authenticate(AdobeClientCredentials org)
             throws IdentityManagementApiException
        Authenticates to Adobe IMS and returns an Auth Token.
        Parameters:
        org - the Adobe IMS org context to authenticate against
        Returns:
        the authenticated bearer token
        Throws:
        IdentityManagementApiException - when any error occurs
